com.bs.action

类 BookAction

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.opensymphony.xwork2.ActionSupport
      • com.bs.action.BookAction
  • 所有已实现的接口:
    com.opensymphony.xwork2.Action, com.opensymphony.xwork2.LocaleProvider, com.opensymphony.xwork2.TextProvider, com.opensymphony.xwork2.Validateable, com.opensymphony.xwork2.ValidationAware, java.io.Serializable, org.apache.struts2.interceptor.ServletRequestAware

    public class BookAction
extends com.opensymphony.xwork2.ActionSupport
implements org.apache.struts2.interceptor.ServletRequestAware
    处理与图书模块相关的接收页面数据，跳转控制。
    作者:
    若水
    另请参阅:
    序列化表格
